title: Census: Most Difficult
question_text: In which of the following situations would it be most DIFFICULT to use a census?

choices.text: To determine what proportion of homes in a small town have garages.
To determine what proportion of students at a high school get driven to school by their parents.
To determine what proportion of teachers at a high school love teaching.
To determine what proportion of sharks in the oceans are great white sharks.
To determine what proportion of Major League Baseball teams are east of the Mississippi River.
